gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.repository
Interface AdverseEventRoutingAndReviewRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdverseEventRoutingAndReviewRepositoryImpl
public interface AdverseEventRoutingAndReviewRepository

This interface has methods to save and retrieve the ReviewComments, and to change the review state of Report and AdverseEventReportingPeriod.

Author:
Biju Joseph

nextTransitionNamesForReportWorkflow

java.util.List<java.lang.String> nextTransitionNamesForReportWorkflow(Report report,
                                                                      java.lang.String loginId)
This method will return the next workflow transitions, available for the user for aeReport workflow. It does the filtering of the next transitions depending upon whether the reports are submittable or not.

Parameters:
report - the report
loginId - the login id
Returns:
the list
